values:
But this one won't be too difficult.

After much deliberation, I've decided it's probably in my best interest to get rid of Livejournal.  I discovered last night I've had it since 2003, and it's just time to let it go.  I only keep it because of one person, and I'm just not really caring anymore.

I will delete this within the next few days, so I guess if you want to keep in touch with me, let me know.

I've pretty much concluded that I'm not going to like this summer as much as I thought I was going to.

The camp that Craig is working for seems to be taking over his life.  He might have to drop his online summer class because of it, which is crap.  It screws up his schedule for next year (fall and possibly spring), and yeah.  I don't know.  I guess he's right when he says that it took over his life last summer... the only difference was I wasn't here in the middle of it all.  Hopefully it gets better as the summer progresses, but we'll see.

As for me, I'm doing alright.  For those of you who didn't know, I got a job on the newspaper here at SIUC, the Daily Egyptian, as the Asst. Editor of the city desk.  Today was my first day, but this entire week is basically just a boot camp, so to speak.  Like today, for instance, I listened to four of the "uppers" talk for 3ish hours about libel, how to be an editor, the editing process, ledes, etc... nothing too exciting.  Kind of boring, actually, but needless to say, informative.  I learned that only 9 campuses in the US have their own printing press, and SIUC is one of them.  I knew we had one on campus, but I didn't know we were one of 9... cool, huh?

I start my first summer class next Monday, and then I don't start my second one until July.  In the meantime, I believe Nancy is going to try and come visit me some weekend, and Jessica and Kim are going to come down another.  Hopefully all of that works out, because I really miss my friends...

Anyway, I think my stomach has finally calmed down, so I'm going to bed...

I was told I should update more often, so I guess I will... for the sake of boredom.

The move into the apartment went rather smoothly.  It was kind of rough at first getting all of the incredibly massive stuff in, but after that part was over it worked out well.  I love my apartment, and I love being here.  It's actually fun living with Craig too.  I figured that it would be weird, but it's not.  I love seeing him every day!  :) It's going to be great.  I know it!

The semester is finally over, and it went well.  My grades ended up how I figured they would, so I'm very pleased.  I start summer school in like 3 weeks, so in that time, I'm going to go home for a week or so and see my friends that are mad at me since I'm staying in Carbondale all summer *:(*, but it'll be a fun week. :)

Anyway, Verizon Wireless is calling my name... in other words, I have to go see them to up my minutes and such.  Maybe if more of my friends got Verizon, I wouldn't be having this issue... haha!  Just kidding, it's my own fault.
I decided that Matt's livejournal had some really ugly pictures on it, so I wanted to put some good ones on mine... &... Oh, &... There, THAT'S better...

No, no.  Not like that.

Just a quick update.

Got back into Carbondale around 1 today, got my books, got settled in... it's LOVELY.  Luckily, I missed the rain... it started raining around 3:30-4, and it's been raining on and off ever since... BLAH.

Saw Cynthia and Justin today... yay!  That was rather exciting.  Craig and I also played my Friends DVD game a couple of times... I kicked his butt both times... in fact, I kept saying I lost or got a question wrong so that we could keep playing at times... haha.  Oh well, it was fun.

I have class at 10 tomorrow... I'll be back here around 2...

I'm sleepy, and I want to watch Friends...
I only have a few things to say... fake people really piss me off. and... i love being forgotten about. it really makes me feel important. That's all... good day everyone! :)

I had a wonderful end of 2005...

I got engaged!! :)

Since we're not getting married until after we graduate, we've decided on March 1, 2008... YAY!!

Hope everyone else had a great Christmas and New Years... you know I did! :)

Can't wait to get back to Carbondale... this town gets old FAST!

Oh, on the downside... I had a cyst removed from my tailbone... and as of today, the stitches are all gone and I am pain free!!!!!! :)

I need sleep now, haha.

Basically, I'm just updating...

School is going well.  I'm finally starting to get busy, which is good because I need to be, but also bad because I hate the feeling of being stressed, haha.

Craig and I doing wonderfully... couldn't ask to be happier!  :)

I'm going home this weekend, so if you're in Decatur and wanna hit me up, go for it...

Next weekend, Amanda and Kelly are coming to stay with me...

The following weekend, Janet will be here...

I am thrilled.  :)

Time for class.

Goodbye.

School's alright.

I've been really tired.. I think I'm going to bed now...

Just wanted to update so I could say I did...

Later.

I just have one thing to say... seriously, what did I do?  I don't understand how everything is great one minute, and the next it's as if nothing ever happened.  If someone could explain that to me, that would be great... 

Okay, now I have that out of my system...

I have a scratch and bruise on my side!  And it hurts!!!!  Basically, I lost a wrestling match, and yeah... haha... don't ask.

That's all.

I decided I should maybe do a quick update since I haven't really updated since I was in South Dakota...

Been back at school for 2-3 weeks now... and I absolutely love it.

Classes are going fairly well... I hate my Geology class, but I keep telling myself that it's my last science requirement and then I'm done... the last class I have to take that I am absolutely dreading is my math requirement, but I am hoping that I am able to test out of that, but we'll just have to see...

Things with Craig and I are very very well... enough said there.  :)

That's about it... :)

Just a quick update, since I'm thinking about it.

I am currently in South Dakota with Craig... he wanted to come and see his parents before we headed off to school, and he wanted me to come with, so here I am.

Other than that, I finished working... my grandpa died... I got a super-minor surgery (I'm okay, no worries)... I went to see Rascal Flatts again (great, awesome, wonderful)... I talked to my suitemate (she's great as well)... and I move back on Saturday... couldn't be more excited.

Thats about it... back to South Dakota stuff.

Rawr... oh, and I hope everyone else is well.

So I last updated this over a month ago, so I guess it's time to let everyone know what's been up...

I've been working hella all summer at the pool and at Claires.  Other than that, I've been hangin' out with my friends (okay, mostly Kim, Kelly, and Jessica, but still.)  A lot of time has been spent at Tj's or Jessica's drinking.  On Saturday night, it was Margarita night, so me, Kim, Jess, Tj, Zane, Rob, Clint, and Tyler all went to Tj's, had some beer and margaritas, and swam.  It was great fun.

As for other things that have went on... Craig came home for a night in July, and then the next weekend I went down to Carbondale for the weekend and came back on a Monday.  I got to see Craig (of course), Naci, Cynthia, Justin and Ara.  And I also saw a lot of people from church, and I made a couple new friends.  Yay!

This saturday, I'm going to a Cubs game with Janet and her family.  Then, on the 12th of August, I'm going to a Rascal Flatts concert with Kim and Kelly at the State Fair, and then the next day Craig and I are leaving for South Dakota from the 13th-18th, and then on the 20th I move back down to school.  I am soooo excited, I can't wait!  I actually have a single this year, so it'll be fun.  Kaitlin and Jill are in the single suites right above me, and then on the floor under them there's Craig, Justin, Justin, Richia, and lots more people.  I've got friends on the 10th floor and I have one or two on the 9th floor, and then yeah.  COULDN'T BE MORE THRILLED!!!

Oh, Craig officially comes home for the summer on August 8th.  I am SO EXCITED!  He won't get to see Jessica again before she leaves for Kentucky, but hopefully we'll get to go down and visit her during the school year so it'll be all good.  :)

Okay, I have some lunch waiting for me and then I have to get a shower (since I just got off work at the pool) and get ready to go work at Claires... great fun, I know.

<3.

Oh, PS, my name was pulled in the on-campus parking lottery... meaning I get to park on campus again.  Friggin' yay!!!!!!

Yeah, I still exist.  I mostly write in my xanga, though, so yeah...

Not a whole lot's been goin' on lately.  Just gettin' back into the "swing of things" here in Decatur... working two jobs (Sun N fun for the 4th summer and Claires for the 2nd summer)... yeah, fun times, I know.  Oh, and hanging out with Kim, Kelly and Craig.  Sad thing is that Craig leaves for Carbondale for the summer this weekend, and I won't get to see him again until the weekend of July 8th when I go down there to visit him and my friends Justin, Cynthia, Teresa, Naci, and everyone else that's cool enough to go to school during the summer... oh wait, that's going to be me next year.  OoOoops... :)

That's really about it...

Oh, I'm going to a Cubs game on July 30th with Janet... and I'm going to see Rascal Flatts (for the second time) on August 12th at the state fair with Kim and Kelly... yes yes, I am super excited.  Rascal Flatts with my two best friends... what's better than that?! Oh, and when Craig comes back for a week and a half in August, he's staying with me... why, you ask?  Well, mostly because I guess he can't really stay with his grandparents in Heyworth, he doesn't want to rent, and his parents are going to be in their new home of South Dakota.  So yeah, I'm looking forward to that as well.  Chances are he'll end up going to the concert in August with us too since he'll be here, but who knows.  Only time will tell.

Well, I promised Craig I'd basically go right to bed since I was so exhausted, so I'm going to follow through with that... goodnight everyone.

72 days until Carbondale!  CAN'T WAIT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Do you see me, do you feel me like I feel you
Call your number, I cannot get through
You don't hear me, and I don't understand
When I reach out, well I don't find your hand
Were they wasted words?  And did they mean a thing?
And all that precious time, but I still feel so in between

Someday, I just keep pretending
That you'll stay, dreaming of a different ending
I wanna hold on, but it hurts so bad
And I can't keep something that I never had

Well I keep tellin myself things can turn around with time
And if I wait it out, you can always change your mind
Like a fairytale, where it works in the end
Can I close my eyes, have you lyin here again
Then I come back down, then I fade back in
Then I realize it's just what might have been

Someday, I just keep pretending
That you'll stay, dreaming of a different ending
I wanna hold on, but it hurts so bad
And I can't keep something that I never had

Am I a shadow on your wall?  Am I anything at all?
Anything to you?
Am I a secret that you keep?  Do you dream of me while you sleep
after all?

Someday, I just keep pretending
That you'll stay, dreaming of a different ending
I wanna hold on, but it hurts so bad
And I can't keep something that I never had
That I never had
I wanna hold on, but it hurts so bad
But I can't keep something that I never had

You don't see me, you don't feel me like I feel you...

I never wanted you to be
Just a memory
Just a body in a photograph
Just a casual conversation.

If I knew this was going to happen,
I never would have wanted you to have
Such a huge part in my life
Of who I am.

Who I used to be
Is just a memory
Faded away into the shadows
Of who I am now
Because of you.

And that is all I will
Ever be.
And that is all I never
Wanted to be.

And as I think about it
I am but a chapter in your storybook...
And you're turning the page

My best friend is leaving...

My boyfriend is probably going to break up with me...

I've hit my head TWICE in one day in the same place really hard...

My foot still hurts...

My grandpa is dying...

What the fuck ever.

Not a whole lot went on today. Lots of thinking. Yea, thinking. I had a lot to think about today. A lot of meaningful conversation. It's amazing, really. Something else I find completely funny is how one song can hold SO MUCH irony. Especially when the irony is directed at the person who introduced me to the song for... well, unmentionable reasons. Ha. Things I think are settling down. Well, on the outside. On the inside I'm still screaming at the top of my lungs, waiting for someone to hear me, but thus far I have been unsuccessful. Why? Well, duh, it's on the inside. No one really knows. So, it all works out, right? Probably not, but I learn from my mistakes... eventually. Tomorrow after class I think I'm going to go lay out. And go get one of my textbooks. And work on homework. Yep, fun day. Oh, and I'll probably watch more Friends. Oh, and North Carolina is the NCAA champs with Illini as runner up... congrats. It was a really great game... I enjoyed it. In fact, I think I have a sore throat from yelling at the television... Just take me as I am... So please, have faith... Night.

So, today wasn't awful... it was a nice day outside.  Yep.

Umm... I guess I never really have anything to say in here.  Haha, sorry guys.

You know, people never cease to fucking amaze me...

Yep... that's all I have to say.
What do you do when no matter what decision you make, you're going to hurt one of the most important people in your life?

Not much to say, really... school's been stressin' me out, and I can't wait for Friday when spring break starts... there's a slight possibility that I might go to Florida with Craig RA, but I don't know... I'd really like to... we'll just have to see.

Got the Sims 2 University Expansion Pack.  I really like it; it's a lot of fun.  That's about.

Anyone got Facebook?

Okay, so I guess I'm writing in here just because... well, it's 2:12 in the morning, I'm still up, I'm exhausted, and I'm bored and too retarded to get the hint that my body is trying to tell me to go to sleep... oh, also, I'm waiting for this song to get over so that I can go to bed...

So, not much today. Class. Mall... got new jeans!... Homework.  Eat.  More homework.  Gilmore girls.  One Tree Hill.  More Homework.  Phone.  More Homework.  Here.  Next in line should be sleep...

Tomorrow, I have class and guess... yep, more homework.  Go me!  haha... gotta love college.  :)  You know I do!

Okay, I'm out.

So, I'm updating for the sake of updating... it's like my duty, or something stupid like that...

Been a fairly boring weekend.  I'm sick for the second time in a month, so I'm getting kind of aggravated with that, but I'll be alright.  On Monday, I'll know whether I have strep or not, so that should be interesting.  I hope I don't, but if I do I won't be too terribly surprised because it's been going around.

I've basically figured out that I will be in Florida like the whole month of July.  I'm very excited.  I'll probably be with Craig RA the entire time, so again, it'll be fun.  I can't wait to get on the beach and just CHILL.  I miss the beach... ::sigh::... and tanning... yeeees.... oh, and don't forget shopping at the cute little beach stores!

Well, I am very tired, and it's 4:08 a.m., so I am going to bed.  Good night!

Somewhat eventful weekend...

Friday didn't really do much.  The boys and I went to Sonic's, then went to Walmart and bought "Scene It" Disney... and played it... and it was actually really fun, and funny because you'd think it was easy because it's Disney trivia basically, but some of the stuff was actually like wtf?!  haha

Saturday, I was just around the dorms until about 4 when the boys and I headed off to Fairview Heights to go to Gordmans and just do whatever other shopping we felt compelled to do... I only bought a sweatshirt from Old Navy and some perfume from Gordmans... blah... then we came back here and basically just crashed... OH, I got popcorn shrimp when we got back... haha

Today was homework and laziness... our church from 8:30-9:30, Denny's for breakfast, then Craig RA's church from 10:45-12... watched "Little Black Book" with Craig like waaaaaaay later... and then we talked for about 2 hours....

Bedtime...

So not much went on today... Tim called and woke me up around 10... then I was up until around noon while watching "Without a Paddle"... paused it, though, because I knew I was going to fall asleep... woke up again a little before 3, and around 5:30 I decided to get dressed and do SOMETHING...

My mom made me cheese soup for dinner tonight... yummies!....and after that, me and Kelsey went to JoAnn Fabrics to get... well, fabric... to make me another blanket, then we went to Blockbuster to take videos back and then I got "Jersey Girl" and "Along Came Polly"... then we went to DQ to get some ice cream...

Now it's storming, so that's about it.

3 nights... :)

Did I mention.... 

oh, nevermind.

Time for bed.

I'm losing my mind!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I am so incredibly bored... and I have been for like the past 72 hours... and nothing is helping!!!

I watched The Terminal, which that was a good movie, but... that's about it.

Any ideas?!!!?!?!?

I still have 4 nights until I go back to school..................... ::sigh::

So it's 3:30am... I planned on going to bed... no, I'm sorry, I WAS in bed a half hour ago, but then my body decided to hate me and get sick... so now I fear that I'm up for at least another half hour to an hour... boo...

Tomorrow... erm... today is not going to prove to be terribly eventful.  I have to go shopping for Cynthia's birthday party at 6, and pray that the weather isn't bad between 5-10 so that I can get to Champaign and back safely... and also, that I don't get lost... yeep... other than that... well, there is nothing else.

Eventually this week I need to go to the bank and finally deposit all this money that I have left over from Christmas, and I also need to go to the courthouse to pay my speeding ticket that I got the first freaking night I was home... damn those Maroa cops... I knew I shouldn't have went to Clinton that night, haha!  jk!

I sent an email to a lady that works in the Area Office for the towers to see when the absolute earliest was that I could go back to school... home... whatever you wanna call it.  Hopefully the answer is Friday or Saturday because I fear I will go nuts if I stay here until next Monday... bah... granted, I love being home, but there's only SO MUCH a person can do in this god-forsaken town.  I mean, let's look at it this way.  Over break, I've basically hung out with 5 people:  Craig, Craig RA, Tim, Kelly, and Kim.  Craig is already gone; he's in Monterrey, Mexico on a missions trip.  Craig RA is, well, an RA, so he's gotta be back Wednesday... Kelly is in high school still and so I can only really hang out with her on the weekends since she works practically every day of the week... Kim is going back on Wednesday to rush sororities... and Tim has to work, but he's also been really busy lately so I really haven't gotten a chance to hang out with him much... hopefully I'll get to see him again before I go back to school... I'm sure I will, though.

Anyway, I'm going to finish talking to my nocternal buddy, Scott, online and then I think I'm going to try to go to sleep... I'm actually feeling a bit... sleepy?
